name: mndoismgmOLD

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cmagm), wcel(c0, csem))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ MndOp, c0 ∈ Magma, c0 ∈ SemiGrp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cmagm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, csem))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csem), wcel(c0, cmagm))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ SemiGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SemiGrp → c0 ∈ Magma)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cmagm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, csem))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csem), wcel(c0, cmagm))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ SemiGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SemiGrp → c0 ∈ Magma)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cmagm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csem), wcel(c0, cmagm))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SemiGrp → c0 ∈ Magma)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ mndmgm as of 3-Feb-2020. A monoid is a magma. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
